document.full_text: arizona's highest court has put on hold the execution scheduled for wednesday of an apartment complex custodian set to die for the 1984 rape and murder of a 13-year-old newspaper delivery girl.
document.title: arizona supreme court stays execution
lines_and_colors: arizona's highest court has put on hold the execution scheduled for wednesday of an apartment complex custodian set to die for the 1984 rape and murder of a 13-year-old newspaper delivery girl.
